item.title: Lightning Routing Ants Pheromones
item.description: Ant routing for lightning network Building on Bitcoin 2018 https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1014530761398145025 https://twitter.com/rperezmarco/status/1013938984718884866 Introduction I wanted to present some ideas for alternative ideas for routing on LN. This was published on arxiv: 1807.00151 (July 2018). http://webusers.imj-prg.fr/~ricardo.perez-marco Overview I am going to talk about what I understand to be decentralized network. Fabrice has already explained most of what is LN about and some history about it. I will just recall a few properties that I need in order to address the mathematical problem of routing.
